DiscreteTimeLib.signals module¶

class DiscreteTimeLib.signals.DiscreteTimeSignal(data=())¶

Bases: object

Discrete-time signal object, implemented with digital signal processing functions.

conv(sig)¶

Compute discrete convolution between this and given discrete-time signal objects.

Parameters

sig (DiscreteTimeSignal) – Given discrete-time signal.

Returns

conv_signal – Discrete convolution discrete-time signal.

Return type

DiscreteTimeSignal object

Returns

class DiscreteTimeLib.systems.DiscreteTimeSystem(b, a)¶
